name: WP Slim Gallery
author: Sumon Hasan

sections.description:
WP Slim Gallery allows you to add gallery items in your wordpress website. This plugin is based upon Slimbox2. It is very easy to use with a simple shortcode.Just use this code [slimgallery] to publish your image gallery .

Demo

Go to Plugin Demo Site

Usage

Follow the instructions below.

  1. Go WP Slim Gallery > Add New.

  2. Give a title and upload image from select your image for WP Slim Gallery.

  3. Create a category and select the category. And publish the post.

  4. Add new image as much as you want to publish.

  5. Use this shortcode in your post or page or widget.

    [slimgallery]

  6. To use this shortcode in your template, write

More Usage Info

Use this code to get to publish your WP Slim Gallery from a particulat category and gallery image count.

[slimgallery category="Your_Category_Name" count="4"]
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress

WP Slim Gallery Menu will appear in admin menu. Add gallery image and create a category. To publish the gallery use shortcode in a post or a page or a template.
